name: AWANA
body_content: AWANA has been an organization since 1950. Its sole purpose is to help local churches get the Word of God into the hearts of children. The 2Â fold goal of AWANA is Scripture memorization and discipleship. The ages for our program are 5-12.

name: Nursing Home
body_content:
Starting in October we will begin a Nursing Home Ministry involving several of our local nursing homes and assisted living facilities.
-Our mission is to show the love of Christ to the residents by our visit,love for them and by sharing the Gospel as led by the Holy Spirit.
- Our group will meet monthly at the church to review what we have done and to access its effectiveness.
- Our visits with the residents will include:
   *Spending time with them, letting them talk to us and we with them.
   * Assisting with crafts as directed by the Activity Directors
   * Sharing the musical gifts from our church
   * Being companions as they go on "Field Trips"
   * A possible pet therapy person in association with another local assembly
   * Spending time reading to those who's eye sight has failed
- Another part of our ministry is to be a helper for our Pastor.
   * Two days a week someone will be assigned to this 
      responsibility. This may be visiting the sick or other things 
      that would be helpful to him
Please Pray that we will honor the Lord Jesus in our efforts..
